title: Macworld Podcast: Apple’s new M3 Mac lineup
content:
Macworld

Apple held its Scary Fast event and on this episode of the Macworld Podcast, we’re talking about the treats it just handed out! M3 MacBook Pros, a new iMac, and more! It’s all on this show!

This is episode 862 with Jason Cross, Michael Simon, and Roman Loyola.
